post.author: 김세환
post.content:
Are you a foreign-trained professional?
Do you need your credentials assessed?

Evaluation of Foreign Credentials

A guest speaker from World Education Services will be providing an information session about comparative education services. Come and find out more information about your academic credentials and the Canadian standards.

Wednesday, March 12, 2003
From 10:00 am  to  12:00 pm

YMCA Newcomer Information Centre
YMCA of Greater Toronto
42 Charles ST. East, 3rd Floor
(two blocks south of Yonge & Bloor)

Please call to register at 416-928-3362 Ext. 2165
If you wish to register at the YMCA Newcomer Information Centre after the session, please remember to bring your immigration document.

Phone: 416-928-6690
Web Site: www.ymcatoronto.org

**위의 세미나는 한인 사회에서 주관하는 것이 아니며 따라서 영어로 진행됩니다. 한인여성회와는 본 행사와 무관하나, 보다 자세한 정보를 원하시는 분은 한인 여성회 취업 담당에게 연락하십시오. (416)340-1234
post.title: Information session
